title: When is the local goverment going to make Landvale Road in Leland a safer speed limit or do there have to be more faulties on that road espeically after todays one.
text:
Reporter Matt Tomsic contacted the Highway Patrol. Here's the answer
he got:



1st Sgt. T.W. Pope of Highway Patrol said Lanvale Road is not more
dangerous than any other highway. Troopers work the road and have not
seen a high collision rate or fatality rate.
